ai-patthana15.86:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.86:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of self-control
ai-patthana15.86:1.1_0: For one who has not arisen, one who doesn’t have a condition for the object of contemplation of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.86:1.1_1: The four supports bring three supports, and the four in number.
ai-patthana15.86:2.1_0: Alazation is a condition for the arising of refuge, but not for the object of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.86:2.1_1: Alazation of death is a condition for the arising of happiness, not with the support of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.86:2.1_2: two, one should have one object, two supports, and one at peace:
